DOC.brief_summary: This meta-analysis was conducted to investigate the efficacy of Topotecan and other treatments for recurrent and stage IVB carcinoma of the cervix
DOC.detailed_description: Studies included in the meta-analysis were: GOG-0179, GOG-0204 & GOG-0169
DOC.criteria: Randomised Clinical Trials or systematic reviews or metaanalyses Treatment with topotecan or platinumbased single and combination regimens in female patients of any race with cancer of the cervix recurrent after radiotherapy or stage IVB disease
